sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Noble and kind. These were the words used by Pope Francis to describe his predecessor, Pope Benedict XVI, who died at the age of 95 on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Speaking at a New Year's Eve vigil in St Peter's Basilica, Francis paid homage to the Pope Emeritus for his work and his faith.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis said, with emotion we remember a person so noble, so kind.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And we feel in our hearts so much gratitude, gratitude to God for having given him to the Church and to the world, gratitude to him for all the good he has done and above all for his testimony of faith and prayer especially in these last years of his retired life throughout the day people here have been reacting to the news of the passing of the pope emeritus passing of the Pope Emeritus. I was approaching the square to pay my last respects, says this woman, even though I'm not a great believer, but he was a great philosopher and a great Pope.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: One man said he leaves the memory of a Pope who for the first time dared to retire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Remembrance services were held in Benedict's native Germany.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Church bells sounded and flags were raised, including in his hometown of Martel, to the south-east of the country, which Benedict had called his spiritual homeland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At least one person has been killed and 20 injured in the latest barrage of Russian strikes on Ukraine's capital, according to Kiev's mayor Vitaly Klitschko.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Among the injured, 14 have been taken to hospital and six were treated at the scene.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's military commander said 12 missiles fired at Kyiv were intercepted by air defenses. Meanwhile, the war is grinding on in the east. Ukrainian troops are battling hard in Kramina, while Russian forces are pounding Bakhmut in the Donetsk region, where President Vladimir Zelensky said was the scene of some of the war's fiercest fighting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Putin claimed that Russia would never give in to the West's attempts to use Ukraine as a tool to destroy his country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the Russian president's nine-minute New Year's message, he accused the West of provoking Moscow and said Russia was fighting in Ukraine to get true independence for its people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In her New Year's message, the head of the European Parliament, Roberta Mazzola, said 2022 had been a difficult year for Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We were tasked to deal with the tailwinds of the pandemic, a perfect storm of climate change, inflation spiking and energy supplies dwindling. All this against the backdrop of war on our continent. But if history, and this year especially, has shown us anything, it is that the European Union comes out of crises stronger and more united. And in 2023, we need to double down on protecting our values. Most importantly, we will continue to stand with Ukraine for a peace with liberty, peace with dignity and peace with security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And despite a fresh wave of missile strikes across the country, Ukrainians are reuniting to welcome in the new year together. A show of hope for peace in 2023.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: show of hope for peace in 2023. France, the UK and Spain are among the latest countries to have announced restrictions on travelers from China. One week before Beijing had planned to lift COVID

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: travel restrictions after almost three years, international health authorities are concerned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In a tweet, the head of the World Health Organization has asked Chinese authorities for transparency and regular data sharing for a proper risk assessment Chinese authorities met with wh-o officials on Friday a spokesman said China will strengthen communication with relevant countries, provide relevant service and guarantee for Chinese citizens outbound travel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The virus has swept through the country as China has turned its back on its strict zero-Covid policy, which has long kept down cases.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Some experts estimate that there may be as many as 9,000 daily deaths now nationwide.
